title: Goodbye, Touch ID: iOS 15.4 shows Face ID is here to stay – and I like it
content:
Apple could very well never adopt the Touch ID sensor on its flagship iPhones again, but since the pandemic started more than two years ago, rumors about this possibility ramped up. Now, with iOS 15.4 set to be released in a few weeks now, Apple shows how it could focus on Face ID for the indefinite future.

more…

The post Goodbye, Touch ID: iOS 15.4 shows Face ID is here to stay – and I like it appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: With iOS 15.4 set to be released soon, Apple will finally kill rumors about the return of Touch ID on the iPhone and focus only on Face ID.
